verbose_text: The UPR has three major outputs that coordinate to maintain ER homeostasis : 1) global reduction in mRNA translation decreases the demand for processing newly synthesized proteins; 2) increased transcription of numerous chaperones and foldases, and phospholipid synthesis to augment the ER folding and export capacity and to expand the ER network, 3) activation of ERAD and autophagic systems to eliminate accumulated unfolded and misfolded proteins, and 4) degradation of ER associated mRNAs to reduce protein folding load.
evidence: decreases the demand for processing newly synthesized proteins; 2) increased transcription of numerous chaperones and foldases, and phospholipid synthesis to augment the ER folding and export capacity and to expand the ER network, 3) activation of ERAD and autophagic systems to eliminate accumulated unfolded and misfolded proteins, and 4) degradation of ER
